name: This Game is Lost
description:
This Game is Lost can be considered as a puzzle game, in which you need to think outside the box in order to beat the game. Its graphics are completely in ASCII style.

This game is currently "lost", it will be available at 31.01.2022 20:00.

Content warning: The actual game is about depression and suicidal tendencies.

Cheat: If you want to pass the first puzzle with a cheat, you can try Left Shift + W.

CREDITS

Programming: Ahmet Kamil Keleş

Musics: Cemre Uyanık

Special thanks to Yiğit Doruk for the initial idea of "A game that's not available"
